description: Monitor your java-tron server with Prometheus and Grafana.

panels.description: Start time of the  java-tron process since unix epoch in seconds.
panels.title: Start Time

panels.description: Up Time is a measure of system reliability, expressed as the percentage of time java-tron process, has been working and available
panels.title: Up Time

panels.description: The latest block height of java-tron on this node.
panels.title: Header Height

panels.description: The latest block time of java-tron on this node.
panels.title: Header Time

panels.description: The number of processors available to the java virtual machine.
panels.title: CPUS

panels.description:
Total: total physical memory.

Free: free physical memory.
panels.title: Memory

panels.description: The system load average for the last minute. The system load average is the sum of the number of runnable entities queued to the available processors and the number of runnable entities running on the available processors averaged over a period of time. The way in which the load average is calculated is operating system specific but is typically a damped time-dependent average.
panels.title: Load Average

panels.description:
Max: maximum number of open file descriptors. 

Current: number of open file descriptors.
panels.title: Open Fds

panels.description: JVM heap used /  JVM heap max.
panels.title: Memory Usage Rate

panels.description: JVM heap detail.
panels.title: Memory Used

panels.description: GC time every minute.
panels.title: GC Time/Minute

panels.description: GC count every minute.
panels.title: GC Count/Minute

panels.description: Waiting for packed tansactions, including pending and repush.
panels.title: Pending Pool

panels.description: Average of the number of transactions in a block within 1 minute.
panels.title: Transactions / Block

panels.description: Average transaction TPS.
panels.title: Transaction TPS

panels.description: Average transaction processing time.
panels.title: Transaction Process Latency

panels.description: Average block generate time .
panels.title: Block Generate Latency

panels.description: Average block processing time when is not catching up.
panels.title: Block Process Latency

panels.description: Average  parallel verification transactions signature processing time.
panels.title: Verify Transactions Signature Latency

panels.description: Node peers Info.
panels.title: Peers

panels.description: Peers ping pong latency.
panels.title: Ping Pong Latency

panels.description: Http network data traffic statistics.
panels.title: HTTP Traffic /10 Minutes

panels.description: TCP network data traffic statistics.
panels.title: TCP Traffic/10 Minutes
